Name: Anime girl Or Bottle?
About the game: This is a logic game in which you need to find all the anime girls and click on them before the time runs out. Also, you will see bottles. You do not need to click on the bottles, if you click or time runs out, the mission will fail. If you want win - you need to click on all anime girls before time runs out. Also game have a second mode where you play for anime girl and you need to collect as many bottles as possible, before the time runs out. Anime girl or bottles? See in the game! Features: -Interesting game in which involved logic and reaction -2 game modes - Simple and fun gameplay -Anime lolly girls (who does not like them?) -Traditional bottles - A good relaxing soundtrack -Steam achievements
